root: ^A crude formation of bones and scattered blood decorates the ground.

c-0: ^Just some stupid bones and blood. Poor guy.
c-1: ^Upon inspection, the bones form a circle, each one pointing outwards in a different direction. The blood seems to be in a discernible, though indecipherable pattern of signs or writing.
c-2: ^Upon inspection, the bones form a circle, each bone pointing outwards. The blood patterns are reminiscent of arcane marks of binding, used to summon or subdue powerful, otherworldly beings.

c-3: ^You disturb the bones and hear a faint rumble rising from deeper into the woods.
